topic.shortdesc: Remove a backup from a backup archive.

section.title: Description
section.p: Use the remove command only when the backup data is no longer needed. The command removes all incremental backups for the specified backup.

section.title: Options
section.p:
The following are the command options:
remove options
Option Description
--dir /[directory name] Path of the backup archive. REQUIRED
--name REPOSITORY-NAME Name of the backup repository. REQUIRED

section.title: Examples
section.p: Run the remove command to remove data from the backup archive travel:./backup remove --dir /data/couchbase/backups --name travel
